ProductInfo.Features:
100% Copper made; quality Assured.
Two pieces of BNC to RCA converters are provided for each cable to connect to a camera with RCA connection.
The 100 Feet video power cable will allow you to transmit video signal and supply DC power for all kind of security   cameras.
Ready for Plug and play. Each cable comes with BNC video connector and 2.1 mm center positive power plug at each end.
2 Pack and 4 Pack are also offered for your choice.
ProductInfo.Name: SainSonic 100 Feet 30M Digital Video Power Security Camera Cable for CCTV Surveillance, DVR Camera Power & BNC Video Cable with FREE BNC to RCA Connectors
